# RetroArcher
RetroArcher is a game streaming server application. This project is under development and nowhere near ready for use.

RetroArcher has this documentation hosted on [Read the Docs](http://retroarcher.readthedocs.io/).

Contributions would be very welcome! Please discuss with us on our Discord server.

#### Integrations
[![Read the Docs](https://img.shields.io/readthedocs/retroarcher?label=Docs&style=for-the-badge&logo=readthedocs)](http://retroarcher.readthedocs.io/)
